name: Family Dish
description: Our largest portion of authentic Egyptian Koshary—a hearty mix of rice, lentils, macaroni, and chickpeas, topped with crispy fried onions and a spicy tomato-vinegar sauce. Feeds 4-5 people. A national treasure in a bowl!

name: Large Dish
description: Generous serving of Koshary: layers of rice, lentils, and pasta, crowned with golden fried onions, garlic vinegar, and a zesty tomato sauce. Perfect for 2-3 hungry food lovers.

name: Medium Dish
description: Classic Koshary—Egypt's beloved street food! A balanced blend of carbs and protein with lentils, rice, macaroni, and chickpeas, drizzled with garlic oil and spicy sauce. Ideal for one with leftovers.

name: Small Dish
description: A taste of Cairo in every bite! Our small Koshary packs all the essentials: rice, lentils, pasta, chickpeas, and fried onions, with a side of tangy tomato sauce. Single serving.

name: Spicy Chicken Pasta
description: Penne pasta tossed with tender chicken, roasted red peppers, and a spicy Arrabbiata sauce, finished with fresh basil and Parmesan.

name: Pasta with Meatballs
description: Homemade beef meatballs simmered in marinara sauce, served over spaghetti and topped with melted mozzarella. Served with garlic bread.

name: Thyme & Sesame Pasta
description: Artisan pasta with toasted sesame seeds, fresh thyme, garlic-infused olive oil, and a hint of lemon zest. Vegetarian-friendly.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Slow-cooked beef ragù with tomatoes, carrots, and celery, served over al dente spaghetti. Garnished with fresh parsley.

name: Laban Rice topped with Pistachios
description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked in creamy yogurt sauce, topped with crunchy pistachios and a drizzle of olive oil. A Middle Eastern specialty.

name: Laban Rice topped with Nuts
description: Yogurt-infused rice with a medley of toasted almonds, cashews, and pine nuts. Light yet satisfying.

name: Trileçe
description: Turkish milk cake soaked in three kinds of milk, topped with caramel glaze. Served chilled.

name: Laban Rice topped with Cinnamon
description: Warm laban rice dusted with cinnamon and a touch of sugar. Comforting and aromatic.
